solution_line_template: The total costs for the fruits is ${oranges_cost} + ${apples_cost} + ${mangoes_cost} = $<<{oranges_cost}+{apples_cost}+{mangoes_cost}={total_fruit_cost}>>{total_fruit_cost}
The amount of money given as change is ${initial_money} - ${total_fruit_cost} = $<<{initial_money}-{total_fruit_cost}={change_given}>>{change_given}
